metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10380 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
kwallet-pam in KDE KWallet before 5.12.6 allows local users to obtain ownership of arbitrary files via a symlink attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10380` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpam-kwallet-common - 4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1
libpam-kwallet5 - 4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> first attempt at fixing this caused a regression in at least artful and xenial, thus reverted.

criterions.comment: kwallet-pam package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:5.12.5-0ubuntu1').
